Definition at line 36 of file CBehaviorEngine.h.

Member Function Documentation

bool CBehaviorEngine::readTeleporterTable ( byte *  p_exedata  ) 

This function reads the teleporter table in case there is any. As far I'm concerned, only episode 1 has one and it is patched by many mods.

Parameters:
episode Episode of the Game. Only Episode 1 should be used if it has really a table. Other the function will fail, what is okay. Episode 3 uses another algorithm for the teleporters.
p_exedata pointer to the data where the exe is located at.
